reviews.text: Small, but very busy station. Has basic amenities, including a ticket machine and a little cafe. Good for changing trains when travelling a longer distance.
Nice little station. Can get very busy but is fairly clean and even has a heated waiting room for those cold nights
Unpleasant, booming announcements, just go to Shrub Hill, much nicer
Usual sequence of intelligence-insulting "safety" messages except played ar deafening volume in the waitting room for platform 2.

Having made plans just to have them screwed up by someone who gave us the wrong information. Luckily we had a plan B. This isn't the first time this has happened. We have been put on the wrong train before travelling in the opposite direction to where we wanted to go which also wasted a good part of our day.  Substandard service.
